special: Follow Joanas Levelingguide till Level 12. Nightelves need to grind to 12 eventually.
One player in the group should learn Enchanting.
Obtain a Bronzetube for each player
Human Players should get the Quest Killing Fields in Westfall to share it later. Loc 56, 31
Human Players should get the following flightpoints in order Lakeshire, Westfall, Stormwind, Ironforge, Loch Modan, Wetlands and Auberdine.
Gnomes/Dwarves Players should get the following flightpoints in order Loch Modan, Ironforge, Wetlands and Auberdine.
Gnomes/Dwarves Players should get the following flightpoints in order Darnassus and Auberdine.

waypoints.header: Train your Talents before heading to Auberdine.
special: All non nightelves: Get your talents at Level 12 in Ironforge.
Nightelves: Get your talents at Level 12 in Darnassus.

waypoints.header: Arrive ALL at LVL 12 in Auberdine

special: fill the empty vial at the moonwell.
fill your bowl at the moonwell
fill your bowl at the moonwell
Nightelves learn the flightpath and focus on running to Ironforge via Thelsamar (get flightpaths here as well).

The other players should coordinate and try to obtain the 5 Bronze Tubes from Wetland (2 Locs), Thelsamar, Ironforge and Dun Morogh. A short roundtrip Stormwind-Ironforge via Deeprun for the Bronzetube might be a good idea as well.

objectives: in defense of the king's lands

special: Do Timed Quests in the order above.
In a classic the bear is in the cave and not outside like on P-Servers.
In classic the bear is in the cave and not outside like on P-Servers.
Get remaing Bronze Tubes in Thelsamar, Ironforge, Dun Morogh or Stormwind!
Fly to Westfall and get the Defias Brotherhood Quest.
Then fly to Lakeshire and share the quest for all others.
Travel to Lakeshire and get flightpoints on the way.
In Stormwind (Dwarven Quarter) obtain the following Deadmines Quests and share them with Human Players.
All keep Hearthstone on Cooldown. If so, turn to next page for travelling quests.
2nd Location in the West of the Lake

waypoints.header: Group splits in Human and Non-Human
special: Hearthstone for all is on CD or near CD and bound to Lakeshire
Final Destination for all is Westfall
Skip the followup of Messenger to Westfall
Humans share the Killing Fields Quest
Clear Gnoll-Camps and Harvesters on the fields.
Grind the instance till near before Level 20
Go to Trainer, Warriors get Cleave
Grind the instance till all are Level 23

waypoints.header: The Stockades (in front of the instance)

special: Try to obtain more Bronzetubes, if you don't have 5
Go to Trainer, then the Groups splits
A Human player flies to Darkshire to obtain Dextren Ward-Quest.
Another player gets the 'What comes around...'-Quest from Lakeshire.
Share both to all other players.

waypoints.header: The Stockades (in front of the instance)

special: Fly to Lakeshire and turn in Quest.
The walk/fly to Darkshire and turn in Quest.
Grind or Quest up to level 29
Wait for all above before running down to Gnomeregan. Splitting up when running down only costs time for all.
All obtain a white punch card from the entrance mobs.
Grind here till all are at least Level 29.
After turning in all Gnomereganquests all should be 30.
No Jumprun, you need to obtain collectables for all within ONE run.
Punch Card order: Yellow -> Blue (Clean Room) -> Red (Electrocutioner 6000) -> Prismatic (Pummeler)
Quest for Scarlet Monastery. We won't do 'In the name of light', cause it requires travelling to Desolace.'
Followup might make sense, if you want the blue ring (+9 Stamina, +4 Spirit), costs 1 Silver Bar, 1 Moss Agate and some silver
Group Splits in Warriors and Non-Warriors.
Take southern Boat to Theramore to complete the stance quest. Loc 69, 49 (Barrens, near Ratchet)
Buy 3 Soothing Spices beforehand to complete Jarl Quest (Theramore) on the way. Skip Followup.
Do Raptors or Cursed Crew till the Warriors are back
use your swiftness potion and jump
Head to Scarlet Monastery. Avoid Andorhal!
Graveyard till all are Level 33 (Endboss might be skipped)
Library till all are Level 36 (All get the key)
Hearth to Ironforge, train whirlwind, clear up bags, turn in Quests in
All players should obtain their Level 40 Mounts.
Fly to Southshore and turn in Quests and then head back to Scarlet Monastery via Chillwind Camp
Cathedral till all are Level 42 or longer if more gear is still needed
All players should obtain their Level 40 Mounts.
Prepare for Uldaman. Skip other Quests (Long chains or collect quests outside the instance)
Fly to Loch Modan and head south to Badlands (Uldaman)
